import re

def remove_occurrences(s):
    pattern = re.compile('', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = re.sub(pattern, '', s)
    return result

import re

def remove_occurrences(s):
    pattern = re.compile('abcd|efgh', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = re.sub(pattern, 'MUTATED', s)
    return result
